jobDesc: Collaborated with a team of 5 developers to build robust and scalable software applications, ensuring high performance and reliability.
Integrated over 40,000 Excel data entries into the web system by developing an efficient import feature.
Created data tables according to client specifications, including filter systems handling over 50,000 data entries.
Optimized SQL queries to enhance the performance of data retrieval processes involving more than 50,000 entries.
Organized 4 dashboard pages with a total of over 15 charts, including filter systems for comprehensive user analysis related to business processes.
Developed an export-to-Excel feature, allowing users to select data time ranges for management and monitoring purposes.
Led a team of 5+ developers to deliver scalable web applications using ReactJS, improving development efficiency by 25%.
Implemented reusable component libraries, reducing code redundancy by 30%.
Optimized interfaces for performance and cross-browser compatibility, enhancing user experience.
Managed project timelines, ensuring adherence to Agile methodologies and delivery deadlines.
Built interactive, user-friendly web interfaces for client projects using ReactJS and TypeScript.
Developed robust state management solutions with Redux and Context API to streamline workflows.
Integrated APIs to enable seamless frontend-backend communication, reducing latency by 15%.
Developed modular and scalable components for the iECHO platform, enabling efficient teleECHO program management.
Designed responsive user interfaces, increasing user engagement by 20%.
Automated reporting and session reminders, boosting operational efficiency by 30%.
Collaborated with global teams to deliver high-quality, product-based solutions.
Built interactive web interfaces using ReactJS, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated APIs to ensure seamless backend communication and optimized state management.

project.title: Nhask
project.description: Nhask is a Drag and Drop To-Do list web app to make task management, organization, and planning easier

project.title: BeSmart
project.description: Besmart is an E-Learning platform to facilitate the distance learning process.
